title: Didnt receive my LP and IP !
body:
I finished a game , and I didnt receive any LP and IP ,its been an hour and still havent receive anything, the match is showing in my Match History but still at 50LP and like we see on the screen :  there is no IP gain on the win . 
http://imgur.com/a/a8gWU
Can you guys help ! Thanks .

replies.body: I do see the games you've screen shotted here, but I don't see an update on your ranked stats upon finishing the match as Orianna.  This could either something on my side not updated yet or the server possibly not sending the match update to our servers yet.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and figure out what's going on.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
